Reviews.Title: Nice TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: Ted19111
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this TV.  The picture is great, and the sound is good.  The Amazon site said it had three HDMI ports at the time I ordered, but the TV in reality only has one HDMI (I sent Amazon a note to correct the product description.)  I wasn't thrilled about not getting three HDMI ports, but I decided to keep the TV nonetheless since it has a great picture in the size I need and at a good price.

Reviews.Title: unbelievable
Reviews.Author: Wolfie "Diesel Hound"
Reviews.Content: Just received my Samsung LNB460 22inch LCD from AmazonWhat a beauty,even with the set off.I've beena Sony person for 20 years,but this baby is impressive.The picture is fantastic and so is the sound,perfect fora bedroom or den.I read the start up manuel 3 times to be surebut to my delight the set does everything for you.All you do isanswer the promps by cliking Enter and you'r done.I'm glad I picked SAMSUNG for a change.Yes,the hardest workingpeople on earth sure put out great stuff lately.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, abysmal sound
Reviews.Author: A. Helfer
Reviews.Content: With the recent transition to all digital broadcasts, we decided to upgrade our old 13" Toshiba instead of buying a converter box.  We settled on this Samsung (LN22B460), a 22" model.  The tuner on the TV scanned and found most of the digital signals in our area easily enough, even using basic rabbit ears as the antenna.  The menus on the TV are clear and easy to navigate.  The picture is great -- nice rich colors and good contrast -- the best I've seen in an LCD TV of this size.However, the sound is almost totally unacceptable.  It is incredibly nasal and sounds like everyone who speaks is trapped in a big can.  This must owe principally to the fact that the speakers aren't front firing and cannot be too large given the slender cabinet.  Adusting the EQ settings in the Audio menu seems to have little effect on the nasal, dry, recessed quality of the sound.  My laptop computer sounds better.  We'll be keeping the TV but adding some small speakers so it'll sound at least as good as the old $80 Toshiba 13".Recommended but with reservations about the sound.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN22B460
Reviews.Author: D. Preli
Reviews.Content: I just purchased the Samsung LN22B460 and am very pleased with this product.  The previous reviews I read were very accurate.  The picture is very clean and the colors are great, especially in HD.  If not viewing HD channels it is very easy to adjust the colors to get the picture you're looking for.  The set up was very easy.  Just open the box and plug it in.  With not much reading you can figure out how to set up the colors, channel selection, sound, etc.The sound is not terrible like some of the other reviews stated but it could have a little more bottom end to give it a boost.  I'll probably buy speakers to add on as I don't have it set up through a sound system.I've owned several Samsung's over the years and feel that they put out a great product.All in all I would highly recommend this t.v.

Reviews.Title: good picture, but....
Reviews.Author: DeDe O
Reviews.Content: We enjoy this tv, it's a perfect size for the bedroom. One problem we've had, however, is adjusting the color to standard from dynamic, which is used in the showroom because of the brighter lighting. The colors are too bright, especially the reds. I switch the picture to standard, but it goes back to the dynamic mode each time I turn the tv off and back on. Talked with a salesman and he suggested unplugging it for awhile and said it should re-set itself...but it didn't make any difference. If we can figure this problem out, will give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN22B460 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: G. A. Boone
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV - Great Picture - Very good price - Highly recommend the Series 4 over the series 3 or 2.  Samsung series levels is an easy way to differentiate between quality levels.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD TV
Reviews.Author: A. Bernstein
Reviews.Content: I think the product is outstanding.  The clarity of picture is striking.  Set-up was largly intutitive.  Basically I didn't need the instructions that came with the device.  But it would have been good to have instructions on how to fine tune the picture for the room and ambient lighting conditions.  There were none.  There happend to be an article in the newspaper that week that was very useful.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD-HDTV 22 in LN22B460
Reviews.Author: J. G. Fields
Reviews.Content: FABULOUS TV. This my my 3rd Samsung HDTV. We needed a smaller one for the den and this is perfect.  As always, Samsung's pictures are clear and vivid. We have 2 other Samsungs - one 32 in. and one 45 in. Will ALWAYS buy Samsung. Their refrigerators are great too.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I was a bit concerned when ordering this TV because of the comments regarding poor sound quality.  I have not found that to be the case.  The sound I am getting on this set is more than acceptable.  Of course, if you're looking for theater-quality surround sound, you need better speakers.  But for a bedroom set, this is just fine.  I also found the set extremely easy to set up, and I have very little technical ability.  The remote control is straight forward and simple to use, even without reading the manual.  I have no hesitation about giving this TV a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Just the right amount of TV for those who hardly watch
Reviews.Author: M. Stevens-Becksvoort "challenged1"
Reviews.Content: It was with reluctance that I moved into the 21st Century of TVs. Managed to do so just before June 12th. Now that we have this set we actually watch it more often than the old (13") one. We use a roof-top antenna and finally can watch the local PBS station. All the old stations, with the exception of one, now come in very well. The pictures are very clear. Had to play around with the setup, but I managed quite well and am satisfied. We do not have cable TV.

Reviews.Title: Dead in 18 months..... never buy a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Mark in Duri "Expat"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung LN22B460B2D in May of 2009. It worked very well until last week (Dec 2010)when the screen went black when I turned it on. After checking everything I called Samsung customer service who said it needed new firmware (why??) to resolve the issue. So, I went to the website downloaded the firmware and loaded it to the TV through the USB service port. Didn't work...called the service center again and was told the TV would need servicing and since it was out of the 1 year warrenty, all costs would be to my account. I would have expected the TV to last a bit longer...!!! If this is representative of Samsung's quality, I would never purchase another Samsung product ever.  I see they have a newer version of this model..don't waste your money. For the record, I have 4 other flat screen TV's (2 ea Sony, 1 ea LG, 1 ea Viewsonic) all of which are working perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Returning for warranty repair the third time
Reviews.Author: Master Gardener
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV through Amazon August 2009. Picture quality and features are nice. Volume is inadequate at times even when cranked to the max. The big issue: It's been sent back for warranty repairs twice. The TV shuts off without any warning and won't restart. When this occured the second time within a month, I started researching the internet. There are numerous internet postings on numerous websites concerning defective Samsung LCD TVs, with the same issue. The root cause appears to be capacitors that are inadequate for operation, that overheat and "blow" after some months of use. From the comments I've read, literally hundreds of them, other customers experienced the same problem as we did. Depending on the size of the unit, you either return it for warranty service or Samsung arranges for a tech repair on site. They then have the parts replaced with the same inadequate parts as originally were installed and resulting in the same failure. Customers with multi-thousand dollar systems have had to junk their units after a couple years use. I anticipate we will have to do the same, unless I can get an electronic technician to open the unit and replace the capacitors with adequately sized ones. I'll wait unit the unit is out of warranty and fails again.Samsung extended the warranty by 3 months, which is a good thing since we now are returning it for the 3rd time for the same failure.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG LN22B460 22 Inch 720 dpi LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Charles Block
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Sound is a little tiny but than be easlily fixed with a couple small add on speakers.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG TV
Reviews.Author: Tina A. Huehn
Reviews.Content: I LIKE THE COLOR AND SOUND ON THE TV. I LIKE THE TV A LOT.IM GLAD I GOT THE TV I WISH IT WAS BIGER.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: R. M. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I originaly bought the Samsung LN26B360 and I was totally disappointed and returned it. Then I read that the 4 and 5 series are much better so I gave Samsung another chance. I'm glad I did, wow this set is awesome. The picture is so good digital channels look like HD(I'm not using an HD cable box). Sound quality is just ok but, afterall it is a 22' TV and is not really a problem. If your looking for a really, really good 22" this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Great Set
Reviews.Author: Bob McCoy
Reviews.Content: This is my second Samsung within the past year.  The 46" set purchased a year ago has been excellent  and so when I needed another smaller one I came as close to it as I could. Both were delivered on time or before and have been working fine.  Thanks for great service.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture, great reception, nice TV
Reviews.Author: Christian M. Peterson
Reviews.Content: This is our first flat panel TV and we did quite a bit of research before purchasing.  Seems different manufacturers concentrate on different sizes - Samsung had by far the best picture for the 22" class (looked at a bunch of TV's at Best Buy to compare).  TV size was dictated by where it's being used.  Great antenna - we have no cable at our rural location and often have a difficult time receiving local stations.  This TV already had 90% of the local stations with only the coaxial cable connected - I hadn't even connected the antenna yet.  With antenna connected it receives all local channels perfectly.The owner's manual is a bible - there are about 1000 features to this TV that we'll never use nor understand.  HDTV feature is stunning when using new Blu-Ray Disc player.  Have only been using for about one month (Christmas present to ourselves)but so far so good.  Would recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: A great TV
Reviews.Author: James S. Andresen
Reviews.Content: A great TV for Bedroom. No problems out of the box. Easy set up. Sound complaints, I have none. That was the biggest thing I feared before buying after reading reviews. Who needs a home theatre system for a 26"? The sound quality is great for my bedroom. I'm impressed with the color as was my Direct TV installer. You just can't beat the 30,000 to 1 ratio for a TV this size. Next I'll buy the Samsung LNB22460 for my computer room and office.

Reviews.Title: beautiful television
Reviews.Author: abdul wahid "Abdul"
Reviews.Content: I purchase this television two weeks ago and love the picture. I put it in my kitchen and it definitely serves its purpose. I'm usually a Sony purchaser-and still am-but I thought this would be a great looking television for my kitchen. It was definately worth the money for its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. King "zydediver"
Reviews.Content: The product shipped on time and arrived promptly, without any problems..out of the box plugged in and working just great!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: chrometoyota
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for someone, she really loved it. Samsung makes the best products. I own some Sony's and they are just junk!

Reviews.Title: Screen stopped working after 2 years
Reviews.Author: W. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Everything was fine with this unit which I purchased in Jan 2010, until about Jan 2012 when the screen started having issues turning on. It took two clicks of the remote and then it would come on. But sometimes it wouldn't and I had to unplug, wait, replug in and then it MIGHT work. Well, in Sept 2012 the screen never turned on again. You can see the red light flicker when you hit the power button on the remote or on the TV itself, but nothing happens. Not worth your money, TVs should last way more than 2.5 years.

Reviews.Title: Worked through the 90 day warrenty, then...
Reviews.Author: N. Smith
Reviews.Content: This TV worked like a charm until about a week after its 90 day warranty.  Then it began to randomly shut itself off (3-4 times in an hour) with the only method for turning it back on being to unplug it from the wall, wait 10sec, and replug.  It might just be this one set but this ordeal has put a sour taste in my mouth.  I won't be buying a Samsung TV again.

Reviews.Title: loyal Samsung purchaser
Reviews.Author: susana lyn
Reviews.Content: I began with a Samsung cell phone several years ago and have stayed with them.  So. . . I chose a Samsung for my new TV.  So far it's great.

Reviews.Title: DOA!!
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, this tv arrived DOA - wouldn't turn on for the world.  While I'm sure that this was a freak incident for Samsung and realize these things happen, it did not endear me to the brand...I sent it back and ordered a Sony instead (which worked from minute one and has been wonderful).Amazon made for a pleasant return experience, but it was still a hassle and time consuming to repack and ship the dud.  Rightfully or not, Samsung has probably lost my business forever - we all are short on time in life and it's not easy to forget incidents like this.

22-inch high definition TV with 720p resolution
One HDMI, one component, and one composite video input
Improved picture with 15,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, 8ms response time and Wide Color Enhancer 2 technology
Two 3W bottom speakers and SRS TruSurround HD for a rich surround-sound experience from two speakers
One-year parts and labor warranty
